languages.text:
On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, targets must perform a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.
If they fail, they suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (24) and {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g}. Additionally, they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
If they pass, they suffer burning (8) and melting.
languages.original_text:
Получив {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g}, цель выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусом{/g} +10.
В случае провала она получает {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g} (24) и {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}плавление{/g} и на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушена{/g}.
При успехе цель получает горение (8) и плавление.

traits.locale_text:
On hit, targets must perform a Toughness resistance test with a +10 bonus.
If they fail, they suffer burning (24) and melting. Additionally, they are stunned for 1 turn.
If they pass, they suffer burning (8) and melting.

On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, targets must perform a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.
If they fail, they suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (24) and {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g}. Additionally, they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
If they pass, they suffer burning (8) and melting.

On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, targets must perform a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.
If they fail, they suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (24) and {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g}. Additionally, they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
If they pass, they suffer burning (8) and melting.

languages.text:
Получив {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g}, цель выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусом{/g} +10.
В случае провала она получает {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g} (24) и {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}плавление{/g} и на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушена{/g}.
При успехе цель получает горение (8) и плавление.
languages.original_text:
On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, targets must perform a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.
If they fail, they suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (24) and {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g}. Additionally, they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
If they pass, they suffer burning (8) and melting.

traits.locale_text:
Получив попадание, цель выполняет проверку Выносливости на сопротивление с бонусом +10.
В случае провала она получает горение (24) и плавление и на 1 ход оказывается оглушена.
При успехе цель получает горение (8) и плавление.

Получив попадание, цель выполняет проверку Выносливости на сопротивление с бонусом +10.
В случае провала она получает горение (24) и плавление и на 1 ход оказывается оглушена.
При успехе цель получает горение (8) и плавление.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}敌人时，目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，此次检定会获得+10{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。
如果目标未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}（24）与{g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}熔化{/g}状态。此外，目标还会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}状态，持续1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}。
如果目标通过检定，则会陷入燃烧（8）与熔化状态。
languages.original_text:
On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, targets must perform a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.
If they fail, they suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (24) and {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g}. Additionally, they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
If they pass, they suffer burning (8) and melting.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}敌人时，目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，此次检定会获得+10{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。
如果目标未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}（24）与{g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}熔化{/g}状态。此外，目标还会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}状态，持续1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}。
如果目标通过检定，则会陷入燃烧（8）与熔化状态。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}すると、ターゲットは+10{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を行わなければならない。
合格できなかった場合、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g} (24) と{g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}溶解{/g}を受ける。さらに、1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶{/g}する。
合格できた場合、炎上 (8) と溶解を受ける。
languages.original_text:
On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, targets must perform a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.
If they fail, they suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (24) and {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g}. Additionally, they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
If they pass, they suffer burning (8) and melting.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}すると、ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}+10 の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}を行わなければならない。
合格できなかった場合、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g} (24) と{g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}溶解{/g}を付与。さらに、1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶{/g}。
合格できた場合、炎上 (8) と溶解を付与。

languages.text:
Al {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactar{/g}, los objetivos deben realizar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +10.
Si fallan, sufren los efectos {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} (24) y {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}derretimiento{/g}. Además, permanecerán {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdidos{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.
Si la superan, sufren los efectos quemadura (8) y derretimiento.
languages.original_text:
On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, targets must perform a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.
If they fail, they suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (24) and {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g}. Additionally, they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
If they pass, they suffer burning (8) and melting.

traits.locale_text:
Al {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impactar{/g}, los objetivos deben realizar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +10.
Si fallan, sufren los efectos {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} (24) y {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}derretimiento{/g}. Además, permanecerán {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdidos{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.
Si la superan, sufren los efectos quemadura (8) y derretimiento.

languages.text:
Bei {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffern{/g} müssen Ziele eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +10 bestehen. Misslingt diese Probe, werden sie mit {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g} (24) und {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}Schmelzen{/g} belegt. Außerdem werden sie 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} lang {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g}.
Gelingt die Probe, werden sie mit "Verbrennen" (8) und "Schmelzen" belegt.
languages.original_text:
On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, targets must perform a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.
If they fail, they suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (24) and {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g}. Additionally, they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
If they pass, they suffer burning (8) and melting.

traits.locale_text:
Bei {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Treffern{/g} müssen Ziele eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsprobe{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +10 durchgehen. Scheitert diese Probe, erleiden sie {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g} (24) und {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}Schmelzen{/g}. Zusätzlich werden sie {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g}, und zwar 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} lang.
Sollte die Probe gelingen, erleiden sie Verbrennen (8) und Schmelzen.

languages.text:
Lorsque la cible est {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchée{/g}, elle doit passer un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +10.
Si elle échoue, elle subit les effets {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} (24) et {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}Fusion{/g}. Elle est aussi {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}étourdie{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.
Si elle réussit le test, elle subit les effets Combustion (8) et Fusion.
languages.original_text:
On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, targets must perform a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.
If they fail, they suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (24) and {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g}. Additionally, they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
If they pass, they suffer burning (8) and melting.

traits.locale_text:
Lorsque la cible est {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touchée{/g}, elle doit passer un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g} avec un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +10.
Si elle échoue, elle subit les effets {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} (24) et {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}Fusion{/g}. Elle est aussi {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}étourdie{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.
Si elle réussit le test, elle subit les effets Combustion (8) et Fusion.
